ygData.subject: Re: More possible misinformation
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Quit making claims you cannot back up with any known facts whatsoever.  I am sick of this crap.  He showed you a spyglass, big deal.  That means absolutely
ygData.messageBody:
>Okay I guess you didnt see the rest of the mail buddy because i said I SAW
>with my own eyes spyglass.That was the important part.I dont remeber Fxeers
>e-mail adress but it's someling lordgrunk or something . He said he will
>show
>it to any one who wants to see it. I made a character on cazicthule just to
>see.Who cares if he doesnt know the guy personally. The important thing is
>that some one gave him a collapsible pole to make a spyglass with which
>means
>that it is NOT broke.
>
>
>/xalumkin of Bertoxx
><< text3.html >>

Quit making claims you cannot back up with any known facts whatsoever. I am
sick of this crap. He showed you a spyglass, big deal. That means
absolutely NOTHING. Gnomad himself got a fishing pole from a gm-quest and
made a spyglass. What says this new source didn't do the same thing?

Until I see a reference to where new recipes are, or find them myself,
please refrain from such worthless speculation.

When people refer to the skill being "broken", they mean that the recipes
simply don't exist to be found.
